title: coinfola
author: coinfola
created_time: March 31, 2023, 09:14:28 PMLast edit: December 16, 2023, 08:45:20 PM by coinfola
content: Hello everyone,Great news! Today marks the official launch of Coinfola.comWhat we offer: Instant payments to FaucetPay with a low withdrawal minimum of 100 satoshi. Direct BTC payments available with a minimum withdrawal of 30,000 satoshi (BTC only).For earners: Faucet: Claim 4 satoshi every 10 minutes. PTC Ads: Watch sponsored ads for satoshi. Shortlinks: Complete them for free lottery tickets; daily winners. Offerwall: Take surveys or offers for daily earnings. Contests: Invite friends to win monthly prizes. Instant FaucetPay withdrawals from 100 satoshi.For advertisers: Affordable advertising packages. Deposit in BTC or FaucetPay with multi-crypto support. High-quality, bot-free traffic.For promoters: 25% referral commission from PTC clicks (satoshi). 20% referral commission from Faucet claims (satoshi). 4% referral commission from offers, surveys, and polls (Coins). Compete for big rewards in our monthly referral contest. Enjoy lifetime referral income; Coinfola is here to stay.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: coinfola on July 18, 2023, 01:35:04 AM$150 REFERRAL CONTEST ENDS IN 14 DAYS!The entire reward for the REFERRAL CONTEST is $150, divided among 10 winners, according to the order of their activity, as I see it, so it must be clarified.
